title: Appartement Montmartre
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


To rent Paris 18th arrondissement, Metro Abbesses, apartment 90 square meters, fifth and last floor (French counting, no elevator), very silent and sunny (east/west orientation). Two bedrooms, One bedroom with queen size bed, office that can also be used as additional bedroom (one folding bed), very large living room (25 M2), with a canapé-lit. Currently, the appartement is divided for three users. 
Built around 1900, original oak parquet. Fully equipped: bathroom with shower and tub, washer-dryer; kitchen with dishwasher, oven, induction plaques, microwave, large freezer; telephone, high speed internet access (Wifi) with free calls in France. Gas heating and hot water supply included in rent, as well as all local taxes, administration costs and Wifi (representing approx. 560 E/month). Can also be shared for two to three persons (colocation). Great area : rather a village-like aspect of Paris with nearby  rue des Abbesses, rue des Martyrs, …; close to old Bibliothèque Nationale and Archives Nationales. Fast subway link to New Bibliothèque Nationale and EHESS, as well as ENS Ulm.
